channel.title: Listening Circle
channel.description: A music-focused podcast where we talk about our favorite new releases and things currently happening in the music world. Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/uhkeWMd
channel.author: Listening Circle
channel.itunes:author: Listening Circle
channel.itunes:subtitle: The music podcast
channel.itunes:summary: A music-focused podcast where we talk about our favorite new releases and things currently happening in the music world.

item.title: Tool - Fear Inoculum Review
item.description: In this episode, we review the new Tool album, "Fear Inoculum". We had some disagreements here and there, and gave some insight into the band's writing style and comparisons to previous albums. Cast: Elias, Luke, Liam, Dante, Elijah, Shane, Ian, Richard. Intro music by Danny Pelayo, Elias Jackson
item.dc:creator: Listening Circle
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, we review the new Tool album, "Fear Inoculum". We had some disagreements here and there, and gave some insight into the band's writing style and comparisons to previous albums. Cast: Elias, Luke, Liam, Dante, Elijah, Shane, Ian, Richard. Intro music by Danny Pelayo, Elias Jackson

item.title: What Makes A Good Concert?
item.description: In this episode, we talk about our favorite live experiences as well as some concert horror stories, and create our dream concert lineup. Cast: Elias, Luke, Liam, Dante, Elijah, Ian, Jackson, Joshua. Intro music by Danny Pelayo, Elias Jackson
item.dc:creator: Listening Circle
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, we talk about our favorite live experiences as well as some concert horror stories, and create our dream concert lineup. Cast: Elias, Luke, Liam, Dante, Elijah, Ian, Jackson, Joshua. Intro music by Danny Pelayo, Elias Jackson

item.title: The Music Industry
item.description: Luke, Liam, and Elias provide some insight into how the music industry has evolved, and how digital media and self-publishing are revolutionizing the way artists promote themselves. Cast: Elias, Luke, Liam. Intro music by Joshua Allgood
item.dc:creator: Listening Circle
item.itunes:summary: Luke, Liam, and Elias provide some insight into how the music industry has evolved, and how digital media and self-publishing are revolutionizing the way artists promote themselves. Cast: Elias, Luke, Liam. Intro music by Joshua Allgood

item.title: Year/Decade in Review
item.description: In this episode, Liam, Elias, Luke, and Jackson wrap up the year/decade by revealing some of our favorite albums, discussing the internet's favorite albums, and speaking at length about a particular artist that shaped this decade in a massive way. Cast: Elias, Luke, Liam, Jackson. Intro music by Richard Milenkovich, Elias Jackson, Sean Ryan
item.dc:creator: Listening Circle
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Liam, Elias, Luke, and Jackson wrap up the year/decade by revealing some of our favorite albums, discussing the internet's favorite albums, and speaking at length about a particular artist that shaped this decade in a massive way. Cast: Elias, Luke, Liam, Jackson. Intro music by Richard Milenkovich, Elias Jackson, Sean Ryan

item.title: Run the Jewels - RTJ4 Review
item.description: The music podcast is back! We review the latest Run the Jewels album, discussing its profound, captivating lyrics and top-notch production. We also spend a lot of time talking about the ongoing racial tensions and political disillusion in America, which plays into the album’s themes. The podcast ends with a powerful poem by Kaila. Cast: Elias, Jackson, Shane, Dante, Kaila, Grant, Ian. Intro music by Joshua Allgood
item.dc:creator: Listening Circle
item.itunes:summary: The music podcast is back! We review the latest Run the Jewels album, discussing its profound, captivating lyrics and top-notch production. We also spend a lot of time talking about the ongoing racial tensions and political disillusion in America, which plays into the album’s themes. The podcast ends with a powerful poem by Kaila. Cast: Elias, Jackson, Shane, Dante, Kaila, Grant, Ian. Intro music by Joshua Allgood

item.title: 2020 Album Roundup: Jessie Ware, Thundercat, King Krule
item.description: We're halfway through 2020, so we're here to discuss our favorite albums so far. We go through some of our individual picks, followed by group discussions on Jessie Ware's "What's Your Pleasure", Thundercat's "It Is What It Is", and King Krule's "Man Alive!" Cast: Elias, Jackson, Dante, Grant. Intro music by Sweet Blood
item.dc:creator: Listening Circle
item.itunes:summary: We're halfway through 2020, so we're here to discuss our favorite albums so far. We go through some of our individual picks, followed by group discussions on Jessie Ware's "What's Your Pleasure", Thundercat's "It Is What It Is", and King Krule's "Man Alive!" Cast: Elias, Jackson, Dante, Grant. Intro music by Sweet Blood

item.title: Idles - Ultra Mono Review
item.description: Loud, outspoken, and critically acclaimed UK rock band IDLES returns with their third full-length album, "Ultra Mono"! We talk about which tracks had us headbanging the most, our favorite lyrics to yell along to, and how some people on the internet (in Grant's term, "virgins") may have over-analyzed the album. Cast: Elias, Dante, Grant, David, Eric. Intro music by Death Will Bring Change (Check out their new EP at deathwillbringchange.bandcamp.com)
item.dc:creator: Listening Circle

item.title: 2020 Album Awards!
item.description: In this jam-packed finale episode, we discuss our Discord server's Top 15 Albums of 2020! Find out which ones we awarded Best 420 Album, Best Lyrics, Best Night Drive Album, and Anthem of 2020! Cast: Elias, Dante, Grant, Shane, Emmitt. Intro music by Karas
